nodes.bodyText: Why make the change here instead of just fixing the allBoardHexes() erroneous null return and replacing it with Collections.emptyList() (the return value of ArrayList can be swapped to List without issue)
Unknown whether allBoardHexes() is used elsewhere and what effects that may have (e.g. other places may depend on it being null).
It's used in one other place which also fails to check for a null return value.

        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 *  @return a list of {@ink Coords} of all hexes on the board.
          
          
            
                 *  @return a list of {@link Coords} of all hexes on the board.
My fingers are tripping over themselves today.
